org.jetel.data.parser

Class CharByteInputReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.parser.CharByteInputReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharByteInputReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharByteInputReader.ByteInputReader, CharByteInputReader.CharInputReader, CharByteInputReader.RobustInputReader, CharByteInputReader.SingleByteCharsetInputReader

    public abstract class CharByteInputReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICharByteInputReader
    An abstract class for input readers able to provide mixed char/byte data

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CharByteInputReader.ByteInputReader
      This input reader can be used only for data inputs which don't contain any delimiters or char-based fields
      static class  CharByteInputReader.CharInputReader
      This input reader can be used only for data inputs which don't contain any byte-based fields
      static class  CharByteInputReader.DoubleMarkCharByteInputReader
      An ugly hack to provide support for the verbose error reporting in the parsers.
      static class  CharByteInputReader.RobustInputReader
      This implementation of the input reader should be used as last resort when none of the implementations above can be used That means it can be used for multiple byte charsets on inputs combining char-based and byte-based data fields.
      static class  CharByteInputReader.SingleByteCharsetInputReader
      This implementation of the input reader can be used for input data combining byte-based fields and char-based fields encoded in single byte charsets
